Intervention: Single IV Infusion of ZA 4 mg
Participants received a single IV infusion of ZA 4 mg at the start of treatment and a once-daily odanacatib matching placebo tablet for 4 weeks.
Participants received a once-daily odanacatib 5 mg tablet for 4 weeks and a single IV infusion of ZA matching placebo at the start of treatment.
Eligibility: Patient has histologically or cytologically-confirmed breast cancer
Patient is undergoing current oral bisphosphonate therapy, or has a history of oral bisphosphonate use within 6 months of entry into study
Results: Percentage Change From Baseline in Urinary N-telopeptide of Type I Collagen (u-NTx) at Week 4
u-NTx is a biochemical index of bone resorption. Participants provided urine specimens on Day 1 (baseline) and at Week 4 for measurement of u-NTx.
Arm/Group Title: Single IV Infusion of ZA 4 mg
Arm/Group Description: Participants received a single IV infusion of ZA 4 mg at the start of treatment and a once-daily odanacatib matching placebo tablet for 4 weeks.
Unit of Measure: Percentage change  -73        (-80 to -62)
Arm/Group Description: Participants received a once-daily odanacatib 5 mg tablet for 4 weeks and a single IV infusion of ZA matching placebo at the start of treatment.
Unit of Measure: Percentage change  -77        (-82 to -71)
